üßêTaskJoy Task Tracker is a Chrome extension designed to serve YouTube and TikTok users. With it, you can easily track and manage the status of your various tasks on TaskJoy. You can get detailed information about the completion of tasks with a few simple clicks, without having to navigate away from your page, offering a convenient and efficient user experience.

Main Functionüåü:
The primary function of TaskJoy Task Tracker is to monitor your task completion status on platforms such as YouTube and TikTok. Once a task is completed, the system will automatically detect and relay this information back to TaskJoy, allowing users to claim their task rewards.

TaskJoy Key Features:
1Ô∏è‚É£Real-time Monitoring: The plugin can monitor your task status in real-time. As soon as a new task is completed, you will receive an immediate notification.
2Ô∏è‚É£Convenient Management Tool: The clear and concise task list allows you to easily view the status of all tasks, making management and operation straightforward.
3Ô∏è‚É£User-friendly Interface: Our plugin design is simple and clear, easy to navigate and use, requiring no complicated settings or operations, offering a smooth user experience.
4Ô∏è‚É£Data Security: We respect and protect your privacy. All data transmissions are securely encrypted, and your information is used only for task status monitoring and will not be used for any other purposes.
5Ô∏è‚É£Instant Feedback: As soon as a task is completed, the plugin will provide real-time feedback to TaskJoy, ensuring that you can timely claim your task rewards.

TaskJoy Task Tracker is committed to providing a more convenient and faster service for your TaskJoy experience. Add our plugin now, and make your task management easier!
